actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-9, by Mr. Linder.

Rule provides for consideration of S.J. Res. 6 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 4.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 79.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 198 (Roll no. 29).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (S.J. Res. 6) providing for congressional disapproval of the rule submitted by the Department of Labor under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, relating to ergonomics.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of S.J. Res. 6 (ergonomics rule disapproval resolution).

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (S.J. Res. 6) providing for congressional disapproval of the rule submitted by the Department of Labor under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, relating to ergonomics.
